info.name: Asymmetric Blocks SDF
info.description:
SDF inspired by Shane's [url=https://www.shadertoy.com/view/Ws3GRs]Asymmetric Blocks[/url] idea.
The blocks function returns integer id in x,y and distance in z. Click to visualize block ids.
For transition to regular tiling see Limited Asymmetric Blocks
